headline.main: Personal Finance; Many Insurers Will Now Write Policies Covering Persons With Special Risks

docs.abstract: Article on large number of cos now writing policies covering persons with high risks, both med and occupational
docs.lead_paragraph: There used to be a time not too many years ago when some insurance companies avoided you like the plague if you had a history of heart disease, diabetes, tuberculosis, cancer, epilepsy, hemophilia and a wide variety of other ailments.
docs.snippet: There used to be a time not too many years ago when some insurance companies avoided you like the plague if you had a history of heart disease, diabetes, tuberculosis, cancer, epilepsy, hemophilia and a wide variety of other ailments.
